verses.name: Mark 8:1
verses.text: In those days the multitude being very great, and having nothing to eat, Jesus called his disciples unto him, and saith unto them,

verses.name: Mark 8:2
verses.text: I have compassion on the multitude, because they have now been with me three days, and have nothing to eat:

verses.name: Mark 8:3
verses.text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses, they will faint by the way: for divers of them came from far.

verses.name: Mark 8:4
verses.text: And his disciples answered him, From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness?

verses.name: Mark 8:5
verses.text: And he asked them, How many loaves have ye? And they said, Seven.
